reviewText: The products is everything they advertise. It would be make the learning complete if they provided a printed tab or pdf file so we could print out the tabs. It is quite difficult and time consuming to properly write out the tabs using the correct notation.
This video is well done. The instructor Michael Cassell does a good job of breaking down the parts and goes into great detail. I recommend this DVD.

I have really enjoyed this DVD!
The instructor is very explicit and informative.
This is a top shelf DVD!
Well worth the money!
